titles: By the King. A proclamation, prohibiting the seizing of any persons, or searching houses without warrant, except in time of actual insurrections.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the seventeenth day of January, in the twelfth year of Our Reign, one thousand six hundred and sixty.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Searches and seizures --  England --  Early works to 1800.
